text:
@seanhannity Please read!!!!
Sean- Thank you for all you do!
URGENT:   Could you find the stats on total overall death- by state- Jan -June 2019 compared to same periods 2017, 2018, 2019!!!
I suspect all this covid19 panic/shutdown has been a hoax(?).  How many deaths have been miss charted?.
